itinerary.mapNote: Zanskar River raft crossing at Chilling. First homestay. 3350m.
Main valley village. Ruined fort and gompa. 3750m.
Last proper village. Dzo herder settlement. 4060m.
High summer grazing plateau. Kang Yatse 6400m dominates. 4700m.
After Kongmaru La 5260m. Road access. Jeep to Leh. 3900m.

waypoints.name: Kongmaru La Pass
waypoints.note: Trek highpoint. Panorama of Karakoram, Zanskar and Ladakh ranges.

waypoints.name: Kang Yatse
waypoints.note: Trekking peak above Nimaling. One of Ladakh's most climbed.

waypoints.name: Namgyal Tsemo Monastery
waypoints.note: Leh gompa reference. Markha Valley trail starts from Chilling.

waypoints.name: Markha Gompa
waypoints.note: Ancient monastery above Markha village. Ruins of old fort.

waypoints.name: Nimaling Plateau
waypoints.note: High summer grazing plateau. Kang Yatse dominates skyline.
